job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Work in conjunction with the sales team as a key technical advisor and advocate for DoiT while mapping value to the prospect's needs.
     * Implement strategies to improve trial win rates, beat the competition, and develop stronger technical buyer relationships.
     * Contribute to, and employ, best practices in the execution of demos and trials as a subject matter expert on our SaaS packages and functionality.
     * Develop and deliver engaging demonstrations in collaboration with our Sales, Marketing and Training Teams to both business and technical users.
     * Understand and implement technical sales strategies based on competitive selling strategy
     * Understand and manage complex technical sales processes in a complex IT environment with multiple departments and stakeholders.
     * Partner with Product Marketing on effective strategies to manage and deliver demonstrations, maintain demo environments, and respond to RFPs.
     * Present to prospects, customers and partners, at external events, conferences, seminars, etc.
     * Ensure timely entry of data into internal business support solutions.
     * Contribute to systems and tools to provide key business information and metrics to highlight performance and effectiveness.
job_details.full_text:
Solution Engineer, North EMEA

* Work in conjunction with the sales team as a key technical advisor and advocate for DoiT while mapping value to the prospect's needs.
     * Implement strategies to improve trial win rates, beat the competition, and develop stronger technical buyer relationships.
     * Contribute to, and employ, best practices in the execution of demos and trials as a subject matter expert on our SaaS packages and functionality.
     * Develop and deliver engaging demonstrations in collaboration with our Sales, Marketing and Training Teams to both business and technical users.
     * Understand and implement technical sales strategies based on competitive selling strategy
     * Understand and manage complex technical sales processes in a complex IT environment with multiple departments and stakeholders.
     * Partner with Product Marketing on effective strategies to manage and deliver demonstrations, maintain demo environments, and respond to RFPs.
     * Present to prospects, customers and partners, at external events, conferences, seminars, etc.
     * Ensure timely entry of data into internal business support solutions.
     * Contribute to systems and tools to provide key business information and metrics to highlight performance and effectiveness.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on sales support, technical advising within a sales context, and customer engagement rather than core AI/ML development or engineering tasks. While it mentions technical aspects, it lacks the specific AI/ML responsibilities and technologies characteristic of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer roles.

phrases: Work in conjunction with the sales team as a key technical advisor and advocate for DoiT while mapping value to the prospect's needs.
Implement strategies to improve trial win rates, beat the competition, and develop stronger technical buyer relationships.
Understand and implement technical sales strategies based on competitive selling strategy
Understand and manage complex technical sales processes in a complex IT environment with multiple departments and stakeholders.
Partner with Product Marketing on effective strategies to manage and deliver demonstrations, maintain demo environments, and respond to RFPs.
Present to prospects, customers and partners, at external events, conferences, seminars, etc.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand customer needs, sales strategies, competitive landscapes, and to communicate technical value in a business context.
While not core software development, maintaining demo environments implies some level of technical setup and management of software systems.

phrases: Ensure timely entry of data into internal business support solutions.
Contribute to systems and tools to provide key business information and metrics to highlight performance and effectiveness.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining demo environments and contributing to business support systems and metrics tools touch upon operational aspects of managing technical solutions and data.

phrases: Work in conjunction with the sales team as a key technical advisor
Develop and deliver engaging demonstrations in collaboration with our Sales, Marketing and Training Teams to both business and technical users.
Present to prospects, customers and partners, at external events, conferences, seminars, etc.
soft_skills.justification: The role requires significant interaction with sales, marketing, training teams, prospects, customers, and partners, necessitating strong communication and collaboration.

phrases: mapping value to the prospect's needs
Implement strategies to improve trial win rates, beat the competition
Understand and implement technical sales strategies
Understand and manage complex technical sales processes
soft_skills.justification: The role involves understanding prospect needs, devising strategies to win trials and beat competition, and managing complex sales processes, all of which require problem-solving and a pragmatic approach.

phrases: Contribute to systems and tools to provide key business information and metrics to highlight performance and effectiveness.
soft_skills.justification: Contributing to the development of systems and tools suggests taking initiative and ownership of improving business insights and performance.
